text:
@realDonaldTrump @JasonMillerinDC @narendramodi Is Covid19 virus real & about as lethal as the flu?
Yes.
Is the Covid19 virus the flu? No.
Should everyone wear a mask, stay 6' apart & use hand sanitizer at work?
Yes. 
If you take precautions should you stay home from work & close shop?
No, that's a socialist political agenda.
